edu.umass.cs.surveyman.analyses

Interface IQuestionResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicAnalysis.QuestionResponse

    public interface IQuestionResponse
extends Comparable
    This is the data structure that holds a respondent's answer to a question.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SurveyDatum getAnswer()
      Convenience method for getting a single answer, if this question is marked exclusive (i.e., radio button).
      List<SurveyDatum> getAnswers()
      Convenience method for getting a list of answers, if the question is marked not exclusive (i.e., checkbox).
      int getIndexSeen()
      Gets the index at which the question in this question response was seen.
      List<OptTuple> getOpts()
      Gets the list of answers the respondent provided for this question.
      Question getQuestion()
      Gets the question associated with this IQuestionResponse

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestion

        Question getQuestion()
        Gets the question associated with this IQuestionResponse
        Returns:
        A Question object

      • getOpts

        List<OptTuple> getOpts()
        Gets the list of answers the respondent provided for this question. For radio button questions, this will hold exactly one OptTuple. For checkbox questions, it will hold more than one.
        Returns:
        A list of OptTuples, corresponding to answer data.

      • getIndexSeen

        int getIndexSeen()
        Gets the index at which the question in this question response was seen.
        Returns:
        A 0-based integer index.

      • getAnswer

        SurveyDatum getAnswer()
                      throws SurveyException
        Convenience method for getting a single answer, if this question is marked exclusive (i.e., radio button).
        Returns:
        The component corresponding to the respondent's answer.
        Throws:
        SurveyException - if this question is not marked exclusive.

      • getAnswers

        List<SurveyDatum> getAnswers()
                             throws SurveyException
        Convenience method for getting a list of answers, if the question is marked not exclusive (i.e., checkbox).
        Returns:
        A list of Components corresponding to the respondent's answers.
        Throws:
        SurveyException - if this question is marked exclusive.
